memory: You're Alice, the villager.

Day 1 begins.
You: "Charlie was killed on the first night. With only 3 of us left, we need to be very careful with our vote today since the mafia only needs one more elimination to win."

Bob: "Diana is lying. I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafioso."

Bob: "Diana is the real mafioso. I investigated Alice and she's innocent. Diana is trying to frame me because I'm the detective."
Diana: "Bob is lying. I am the detective and I investigated Bob. He is mafia. Alice is innocent. We must vote Bob out to win."

Diana was arrested
